abstract: Egyptian officials say gunmen killed two policemen on Sinai Peninsula; Sinai Province of the Islamic State claims responsibility, distributing images allegedly depicting shooting through social media.
lead_paragraph: A claim of responsibility by the Sinai Province of the Islamic State group circulated on social media accounts of supporters.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Gunmen Kill 2 Police Officers

snippet: A claim of responsibility by the Sinai Province of the Islamic State group circulated on social media accounts of supporters.

keywords.value: Sinai Province of the Islamic State
keywords.name: organizations
